cps.server.statistics

Class StatisticsCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cps.server.statistics.StatisticsCollector

  • public class StatisticsCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    Consolidates the collection of statistics throughout the system. At certain points in the source code, there are statistical entry points, which are calls to the static methods of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatisticsCollector()

      Increase canceled order count by one for today in specific parking lot.
      static void increaseComplaints(java.sql.Connection conn, int year, int month, int lotID)
      Increase the number of complaints filed this month.
      static void increaseOnetime(java.sql.Connection conn, int serviceID, int licenseType, int parkingType, int lotID, boolean warned)
      Increase the number of one-time parking services ordered this month or today.
      static void increaseSubscription(java.sql.Connection conn, int subsType, int lotID)
      Increase the number of subscriptions purchased this month.
      static void registerCellDisableAction(java.sql.Connection conn, boolean disabled, int lotID, int i, int j, int k)
      Collect statistics about parking cell (the location inside of a parking lot) disable/enable actions.

      • increaseOnetime

        public static void increaseOnetime(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                   int serviceID,
                                   int licenseType,
                                   int parkingType,
                                   int lotID,
                                   boolean warned)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                   ServerException
        Increase the number of one-time parking services ordered this month or today. Used as an entry point for both daily and monthly statistics.
        Parameters:
        conn - the SQL connection
        serviceID - the service ID
        licenseType - the license type
        parkingType - the parking type
        lotID - the lot ID
        warned - used to check late arrivals
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error
        ServerException - on error

                                        int subsType,
                                        int lotID)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                        ServerException
        Increase the number of subscriptions purchased this month.
        Parameters:
        conn - the SQL connection
        subsType - the subscription type (regular or full)
        lotID - the lot ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error
        ServerException - on error

      • registerCellDisableAction

        public static void registerCellDisableAction(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                             boolean disabled,
                                             int lotID,
                                             int i,
                                             int j,
                                             int k)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Collect statistics about parking cell (the location inside of a parking lot) disable/enable actions. Record location, date disabled, date enabled.
        Parameters:
        conn - the SQL connection
        disabled - was the cell disabled or enabled
        lotID - the lot ID
        i - the i coordinate
        j - the j coordinate
        k - the k coordinate
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error
